description:
Kan`u and Chōhi are on their journey together, and their first stop happens when, Kōsonsan, a local feudal lord and Chōun ask the two to help them find a hidden base belonging to bandits so they can be eliminated. However upon finding the bandits, Kan`u and Chōhi fight them off, taking away Chōun`s glory.  However, they offer her an alternative...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kan`u, Chou`un to Shinchi ni Omomuku no Koto
関羽, 趙雲と死地に赴くのこと
